meanings.sent1: The unornate room had plain walls and simple furniture.
meanings.sent2: She preferred the unornate necklace with no jewels or embellishments.
meanings.sent3: The unornate cake was a hit at the party, as everyone loved its simplicity.
meanings.sent4: Her unornate dress stood out in a sea of sparkly gowns at the event.
meanings.sent5: The unornate painting captured the beauty of minimalism in art.

meanings.definition: Plain or simple in style or design
meanings.sent1: The unornate building blended in with the surrounding architecture.
meanings.sent2: His unornate writing style was praised for its clarity and directness.
meanings.sent3: The unornate garden was a peaceful retreat from the busy city life.
meanings.sent4: In a world of flashy cars, his unornate vehicle was a symbol of practicality.
meanings.sent5: The unornate curtains let in just the right amount of natural light.
